controller

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.Controller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IController

    public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
implements IController
    A controller that check if the input from the user are valid. Furthermore change this class the model.
    Author:
    Bj√∂rn Hullmann

    • Constructor Detail

      • Controller

        @Inject
public Controller(IFigureMoveHandler figureMoveHandler,
                           IFigureHolder figureHolder,
                           ICheckChecker checkChecker,
                           IGameFieldFactory factory,
                           IGame game,
                           java.util.Set<IMinFigureCheck> minFigureChecks)
        Create a controller for a game.
        Parameters:
        figureMoveHandler - The FigureMoveHandler for getting MoveHandlers
        figureHolder - The figure holder for getting all figure.
        checkChecker - The checker to check if the king is in check.
        factory - The game field factory to get a game field with the start constellation.
        game - The game for which the controller is.
        minFigureChecks - A set with all condition of minimal figure amount to set the king checkmatt.
